title: About Dec 👋
text:
I’m Declan. I’m a modeller - I work with numbers, mostly in actuarial departments. 📊
I also develop calculang, with a mission to democratise numbers. A life project and still a baby 🌱
This website is under construction 🚧
I made this it to share my thoughts about modelling (“calcs”) and stuff. Don’t treat it like professional work or advice.
If you want my professional work or advice, send me a hello by electronic mail to: declann1990@gmail.com 🙂
